entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming sunny late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
